html:
July 30 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Acerinox SA, Red Electrica and Diageo, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Acerinox SA ACX.MC: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 16.50 from EUR 15

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform

* Red Electrica REE.MC: Societe Generale cuts to hold from buy

* Diageo DGE.L: Credit Suisse raises target price to 3950p from 3700p

* Solvay SOLB.BR: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 145 from EUR 128


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
